title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond "Switch Vs. Switch 2" graphics comparison
text:
As announced earlier today, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is going to get a “Nintendo Switch 2 Edition” release, which will give it a bump in the visual department, among other things. Wondering just how much better the game will look on Switch 2 versus Switch? The above trailer gives a side-by-side comparison to make things extra clear.
Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition includes the following enhancements over the Switch version:
- Support for mouse controls using Joy-Con™ 2 controllers
- Enhanced resolution, textures and load times
- Choose from two display modes
- Quality Mode runs at 60 frames per second in 4K resolution in TV mode/1080p while in handheld mode.
- Performance Mode runs at 120 frames per second in 1080p resolution in TV mode/720p in handheld mode.
